text: Bettarini is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Cesare Bettarini (1901–1975), Italian actor *Stefano Bettarini (born 1972), Italian footballer *Valentina Bettarini (born 1990), Italian ice hockey player ==See also== *7141 Bettarini, a main-belt asteroid Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Bettarini
